pages.text: Finality is the magic of ultimate controlâ€”absolute and unyielding. It is a force that dictates the unalterable truths of reality, such as time, space, and existence itself.

Practitioners of Finality can alter these fundamental laws, freezing time, stopping the flow of energy, or even rewriting reality. It is a magic of unimaginable power and precision, capable of controlling the very fabric of the universe.
To wield Finality is to grasp the most dangerous and absolute form of control, where every action carries immense consequences.
